content: purchasable pdf pattern 1 free printable version of pattern which can be saved as a pdf available at the bottom of this page youtube tutorial 2 this blanket uses the half_double_crochet stitch materials * 3 skeins of caron simply soft in country blue * 2 skeins of caron simply soft in white * size h 5 00mm hook * tapestry needle * scissors also available for free at yarnspirations 3 1 https //www etsy com/listing/793960711/crochet-windowpane-gingham-baby-blanket 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=tmbv4qam-zq 3 https //www yarnspirations com/caron-crochet-windowpane-gingham-baby-blanket/cac0202-029269m html#q=gingham&includecontent=true&start=2
